post.text: As of today, there have been nearly 2,300 cases of Zika confirmed in the United States. Hillary met with doctors in Miami to discuss the epidemic and how to keep us safe. cdc.gov/Zika

comment.author: Tawni
comment.text: Clinton and Obama are self indulgent monsters who feed on APATHY. Apathy is evil. Those who are uninformed, afraid, lazy or emotional fall prey to their mesmerizing tenure. The only way to battle evil is with good. We must compassionately educate, counsel with and support those who cannot span the gap on their own. Let's take our country back from these jesters.

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: The only one who is self-indulgent is Donald Trump, he goes to Louisiana when he was told not too. He has stiffed all kinds of people with whom he has signed contracts. He even endangered his great nephew's life for his greed. Who are you kidding? Another ignorant person for Trump! Quit parroting everyone else and do some actual research!

replies.author: Tawni
replies.text: Funny how the LA governor met with and thanked Trump for coming. Do ur research.

replies.author: Eric
replies.text: Actually it was Trump who said he loves his poorly educated supporters :)

replies.author: Nichole
replies.text: Hillary would steal gold teeth from a corpse, she sold all of us out for money
